mapper.update:
UPDATE WX_ACCOUNT A
A.ACCESS_TOKEN =#{accessToken},
A.EXPIRES_IN =#{expiresIn},
A.UPDATE_TIME =#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.JSACCESS_TOKEN = #{jsaccessToken},
A.JSEXPIRES_IN = #{jsexpiresIn},
A.JSUPDATE_TIME = #{jsupdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE A.ACCOUNT_ID=#{accountId}
mapper.select: select a.*, DATE_ADD(a.update_time,INTERVAL 110 DAY_MINUTE)<SYSDATE() tokenState, DATE_ADD(a.jsupdate_time,INTERVAL 110 DAY_MINUTE)<SYSDATE() jsState from wx_account a where a.status=1 and (DATE_ADD(a.update_time,INTERVAL 110 DAY_MINUTE)<SYSDATE() or DATE_ADD(a.jsupdate_time,INTERVAL 110 DAY_MINUTE)<SYSDATE() )
